Package AndeA1_2022

package AndeA1_2022
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AssigmentSpec
    Welcome to Assignment 1 for Programming Fundamentals

    In this assignment, you are approached by a game company which wants to create a card game.
    Card
    This class represents a single game card.
    CardTest
    Class to test and provide example marks for the Card class DO NOT MODIFY
    Deck
    Contains a deck of cards (read an array) This class maintains a list of all available unused cards When a card is removed the list of cards get shorter.
    DeckTest
    Class to test and provide example marks for the Deck class DO NOT MODIFY
    Dragon
    This is the enemy dragon class.
    DragonTest
    Class to test and provide example marks for the Dragon class DO NOT MODIFY
    Game
    This class is where the game takes place.
    GameTest
    Class to test and provide example marks for the Game class DO NOT MODIFY
    Hand
    Represents the current players hand of cards.
    HandTest
    Class to test and provide example marks for the Hand class DO NOT MODIFY
    ToolKit
    You do no need to edit this class.
